thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com
thread.title: Alyssa

author: Alyssa
title: Alyssa
text: TicketCity Customer Service might be the best I've ever experienced! Justin was excellent in answering all of my questions over the phone...no matter how many times I called back! Shana ensured that my tickets would be delivered on time. When my tickets were ready to ship, I was called to confirm the address and was able to change it without a problem! I would highly recommend TicketCity and their team for your next ticket purchase!
